user_input: Which NGAP procedure is used for inter-system load balancing? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ranintnagapranintrrcnextprocedureintersystem loadbalancingricnotificationrequestprocedure is used for intersystem load balancing
reference: the ngap procedure used for intersystem load balancing is uplink ran configuration transfer

user_input: What is covered by enhanced application layer support for V2X services? [3GPP Release 17]
response: enhanced application layer support for v2x services includes support for v2x application layer functionalities and a set of application layer formats
reference: enhanced application layer support for v2x services covers the support of advanced v2x services considering existing stage 1 and stage 2 work within 3gpp and v2x application requirements defined outside 3gpp

user_input: What does the Load-Balancing steering mode do? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the loadbalancing steering mode shifts data towards cells that can accommodate the traffic better and improve the load balancing effect
reference: the loadbalancing steering mode splits the traffic of a data flow across 3gpp and non3gpp accesses in both uplink and downlink directions separately

user_input: What is the main objective of intent driven management for service or network management? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the main objective of intent driven management is to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of service or network management operations
reference: the intent driven management aims to reduce the complexity of management without getting into the intricate detail of the underlying network resources

user_input: What does MINT stand for? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
mint stands for mobility internet services terminally optimized and negotiated
explanation mint is a set of capabilities to achieve a mobile application running on one ue communicating with the server with the highest possible degree of mobility and reliability
reference: mint stands for minimization of service interruption

user_input: What is the purpose of the Media Streaming AF Event Exposure work item? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the media streaming af event exposure work item is to study how to expose the af information like afresource allocation afran release etc in a common format and utilize it by the sdap arap or ranpps
reference: the work item relates to the support of generic ue data collection reporting and event exposure and the 5g media streaming instantiation of the generic functionality

user_input: What is the purpose of load-balancing steering mode enhancements? [3GPP Release 17]
response: loadbalancing steering mode enhancements improve network traffic distribution among cell groups
reference: in rel17 loadbalancing steering mode enhancements allow the ue and upf to freely and independently select their own percentages for each access type maximizing the aggregated throughput

user_input: What is a capability added in the V2X Application Enabler (VAE) layer? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the v2x application enabler vae adds network connectivity ue access application management and application qos quality of service to the 3rd generation partnership project 3gpp ues in the v2x application layer
reference: v2x service discovery across multiple v2x service providers is a capability added in the v2x application enabler vae layer

user_input: What is the purpose of the Edge Data Network (EDN) in enabling edge applications? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the edge data network edn is to provide a backbone network for supporting the application of data analytics at the network andor application level enabling applications with low latency
reference: the edge data network edn hosts the edge application servers and the edge enabler server ees

user_input: What are the three features specified in TS 23.304 for 5G ProSe Direct Communication over NR based PC5 reference point? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the three features specified in ts 23304 for 5g prose direct communication over nr based pc5 reference point are user management functionality ue mobility and nr coverage
reference: the three features specified in ts 23304 for 5g prose direct communication over nr based pc5 reference point are broadcast mode groupcast mode and unicast mode

user_input: How is service continuity supported for specific slice(s)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: support for specific slices allows service continuity even if one or more resources supporting those slices fail
reference: service continuity for specific slices is supported through multicarrier resource sharing or resource repartitioning

user_input: How can UE power consumption due to false paging alarms be reduced? [3GPP Release 17]
response: false paging alarms can trigger ue power consumption due to powerup and down processes leading to power waste power management mechanisms can be applied to reduce power consumption
reference: ue power consumption due to false paging alarms can be reduced by dividing ues into multiple subgroups

user_input: What is the purpose of Generic Bootstrapping Architecture (GBA) in 5GC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of gba is to allow enduser devices in 5g access to services through a roaming process between operator networks
reference: gba enables application functions in the network and on the ue side to establish shared cryptographic material based on 3gpp credentials

user_input: What is the purpose of the Small Data Transmission (SDT) feature in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
sdt allows nr to transmit very small pieces of data that are often generated by applications without blocking user access
explanation sdt is a feature that enables nr to transmit small pieces of data that are often generated by applications
reference: the small data transmission sdt feature allows data andor signalling transmission while the ue remains in rrcinactive state

user_input: What functionality does Signalling Based Activation provide? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
signalling based activation sba is a feature providing a service activation method where network functions are activated upon creation of a signalling relation between the user and the network
explanation sba provides a method to activate network functions based on signalling relations
reference: signalling based activation provides the capability to request collection of end user service performance information for one specific ue

user_input: What are the enhancements for idle/inactive-mode UE power saving in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the idleinactive mode ue power saving enhancements for nr include using reduced transmit power changing frequency or modulation scheme reducing subframe size and the use of physical downlink control signal
reference: the enhancements for idleinactivemode ue power saving in nr include paging enhancements to reduce ue reception power consumption

user_input: How does a Multi-USIM UE indicate to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to CM-IDLE state? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a multiusim ue indicates to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to cmidle state by setting the multiusimnopagingindication field in the nas response to 1
reference: a multiusim ue indicates to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to cmidle state by sending a reject paging response

user_input: What is the purpose of the Slice-Maximum Bit Rate (S-MBR)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the slicemaximum bit rate smbr is used to describe the bit rate constraint that the epc can use
reference: the smbr is defined to limit the aggregate data rate in ul and dl per ue across all qos flows for all pdu sessions associated with a slice

user_input: What aspects of the Disaster Roaming service are specified in TS 22.011 and TS 22.261? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the specifications of the disaster roaming service for the use case roaming are described in ts 22011 and ts 22261
reference: the service requirements for the 5g system are specified in ts 22011 and ts 22261

user_input: What is the purpose of the Provision of potential TRS/CSI-RS occasion(s) to idle/inactive-mode UEs? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose is to notify idleinactive ues of trscsirs occasions being provided
reference: the purpose of providing trscsirs occasions to idleinactivemode ues is to reduce ue power consumption for synchronization

user_input: What does SL DRX stand for in the context of NR Sidelink? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
sl drx stands for sl drx on the downlink in the context of nr sidelink
explanation sl drx is used when a ues is in nr sl sleep mode and not fully active for drx on the downlink
reference: sl drx stands for sidelink discontinuous reception in the context of nr sidelink

user_input: What is Non-Seamless WLAN offload (NSWO) in the context of 5GS? [3GPP Release 17]
response: nswo is an approach where 5gs applications offload the connectivity from the core network to an external network or a user equipment
reference: nswo is an optional capability of a ue supporting wlan radio access allowing it to route specific ip flows via wlan access without going through the 3gpp core network

user_input: What is the purpose of the extended work item on 8K Television over 5G? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the extended work item on 8k television over 5g aims at enhancing the requirements for 8k video in 5g
reference: the work item specifies an hevcbased 8k tv operation point in ts 26116 and the corresponding media decoding capabilities for 5gms in ts 26511

user_input: In supporting an MA PDU Session, what does Rel-17 enable in terms of 3GPP access over EPC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: rel17 enables the use of different transport protocols such as packetswitched access or dedicated access in 5g networks and support the interworking with epc
reference: rel17 enables the establishment of userplane resources over epc for 3gpp access in supporting an ma pdu session allowing for simultaneous traffic over epc and non3gpp access

user_input: In Rel-17, enhancements are made to several SEAL services. Which of the following is NOT an enhancement to SEAL services in Rel-17? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the enhancement to the sealroamservice does not involve changing the transport and network interface protocols for the rni signaling in the ue
reference: the question is asking for the enhancement that is not made to seal services in rel17 option 4 support for enhanced service enabler architecture layer seal is incorrect because seal itself was already specified in rel16 the other options options 13 and 5 are the enhancements made to seal services in rel17

user_input: Which procedures are impacted by MUSIM according to TS 23.502 and TS 23.401? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the document specifies that both the procedures described in ts 23501 eutran and core network release procedures and in ts 23502 utran and core network architecture for endtoend signalling are impacted by musim as per ts 23502 and ts 23401
reference: the procedures impacted by musim according to ts 23502 and ts 23401 are service request registration  attach  tracking area update and n2 paging  s1 paging

user_input: How does a Multi-USIM UE modify the timing of paging occasions in 5GS? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a multiusim ue in 5gs is permitted to modify the timing of paging occasions
reference: a multiusim ue modifies the timing of paging occasions in 5gs by triggering a new 5gguti reallocation without any specific indication

user_input: What is the purpose of the Network Slice AS Group (NSAG)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the nsag determines the slicing architecture and configuration for 5g network slices
reference: the nsag mechanism is introduced to perform slice aware cell reselection and slice specific rach configuration

user_input: How are network nodes and NG-RAN configured with Disaster Condition? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the network configuration with disaster condition can be set to network nodes and ngran
reference: the network nodes and ngran are configured with disaster condition via oam based on operator policy and the request by the government agencies

user_input: What is the purpose of the Access Traffic Steering, Switching and Splitting (ATSS) feature in 5G networks? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
atss helps reduce latency by switching or splitting packets for different traffic classes
explanation the access traffic steering switching and splitting atss feature is used to steer and split packets based on 5g radio resource control information to reduce latency
reference: the atss feature enables the establishment of a multi access ma pdu session which supports multipath data communication between the ue and upf

user_input: What is the purpose of the Network Data Analytics Function (NWDAF)? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
nwdaf shall be used to analyze network usage and measure the efficiency and performance of network components
explanation the purpose of nwdaf is to analyze network usage and measure the efficiency and performance of network components
reference: the purpose of the network data analytics function nwdaf is to support network automation

user_input: What are the key functionalities of MDT enhancement? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the key functionalities of mdt enhancement are traffic isolation load balancing network mobility management and session management
reference: the key functionalities of mdt enhancement are aimed at enhancing network data analytics services

user_input: How can UE power saving be enabled by relaxing measurements for RLM/BFD? [3GPP Release 17]
response: relaxing measurements for rlmbfd enables ue power saving by reducing the amount of work needed during interfrequency or inter rat mobility
reference: ue power saving can be enabled by relaxing measurements for rlmbfd which helps reduce ue power consumption during idleinactive mode

user_input: What does the 5G LAN VN group service charging specify? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the 5g lan vn group service charging is based on the ue group configuration in the cn and specifies the 5g lan vn group service charging information for a given group id
reference: the 5g lan vn group service charging specifies the charging principle charging requirements service operations and charging information for 5g virtual network group service charging

user_input: Which documents specify the information to be pre-configured or stored in USIM for Disaster Roaming service? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ts 31120 states that the information to be preconfigured or stored in usim for disaster roaming service should be documented in the tr 33801 series
reference: the information to be preconfigured or stored in usim for disaster roaming service is specified in ts 31102 and ts 31111

user_input: What is the purpose of cyber-physical control applications in vertical domains? [3GPP Release 17]
response: enhance performance reliability and security in vertical domains by optimizing the interaction between physical devices and the digital world is the purpose of cyberphysical control applications
reference: the purpose of cyberphysical control applications in vertical domains is to control physical processes over a network using algorithms this is stated in the document summary

user_input: Where are the security aspects on the UE authentication during the authentication procedure specified? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the security aspects on the ue authentication during the authentication procedure are specified in ts 32300
reference: the security aspects on the ue authentication during the authentication procedure are specified in ts 33501

user_input: What is the purpose of the Work Item 'Enhancement of Private Network support for NG-RAN'? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
the purpose of the work item enhancement of private network support for ngran is to enhance support for private networks by increasing support of remote users in the epc allowing ngran to connect ue with multiple private networks and increasing support of nguamt and multiuser mimo technologies
explanation the work item aims to enhance private networks support by increasing support of remote users allowing connection of ues with multiple private networks and increasing support of nguamt and multiuser mimo technologies
reference: the purpose of the work item enhancement of private network support for ngran is to support ims voice and emergency services for snpn this is stated in the document summary

user_input: Which 3GPP system entities are impacted by MUSIM? [3GPP Release 17]
response: musim impacts 3gpp system entities like the ue eutra bwp and eutran and the gnb
reference: the 3gpp system entities impacted by musim are ue mme  amf ran  ngran and sgwc  smf new rejection cause

user_input: What is specified in TS 24.588 related to V2X services? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the v2x service specifications shall specify the qos and communication parameters required for v2x communication
reference: ts 24588 specifies the user equipment ue policies for v2x services

user_input: What is the purpose of the RedCap UE type? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the redcap ue type allows a ue to support nr and lte access to the same core network
reference: the redcap ue type enables reduced ue complexity and power consumption for iot use cases with low data rate requirements

user_input: What are the objectives of the schemes introduced in the MUSIM work item for LTE/NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the objectives of the schemes introduced in the musim work item are to enable a high degree of resource block allocation flexibility to allow for more efficient resource utilization in frequency division duplex fdd systems and to reduce interference effects on coprimary users of the lte and nr systems
reference: the objectives of the schemes introduced in the musim work item for ltenr are to address the paging occasion collision issue to notify the network of a switch for musim purpose and to indicate whether an incoming paging is for voice service

user_input: Which document specifies the MUSIM-specific rejection cause for EPS? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the document 26272 specifies the musimspecific rejection cause for eps
reference: the musimspecific rejection cause for eps is specified in ts 29274

user_input: What is the purpose of file management in network management? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of file management is to implement the file system management functions for the network and the related storage systems
reference: file management in network management involves storing and transferring different kinds of data between network functions and management functions

user_input: Under what conditions does the UE ignore PDCCH skipping? [3GPP Release 17]
response: if pdcch skipping is performed without any trigger event the ue shall ignore it and only receive pdcch
reference: the ue ignores pdcch skipping when sr is sent and is pending on all serving cells of the cell group during monitoring of the rarmsgb window on spcell and while contention resolution timer is running on spcell

user_input: What is the purpose of the ECM Work Item and the resulting specification in TS 28.538? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the ecm work item and the resulting specification in ts 28538 is to improve the quality of voice traffic in 5g nr
reference: the ecm work item and the resulting specification in ts 28538 provide management provisions and solutions for edge computing

user_input: What is the purpose of Enhanced Closed loop SLS Assurance solution? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
enhanced closed loop sls assurance solution is used to enhance assurance mechanisms to better protect 5g core network infrastructure
explanation the document mentions the enhanced closed loop sls assurance solution to be used to provide more stringent assurance on protection against the sls attacks
reference: the enhanced closed loop sls assurance solution helps an operator to continuously deliver the expected level of communication service quality

user_input: What is the purpose of the UE-assistance indication in load-balancing steering mode? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the ueassistance indication is to allow the network server to assist the ue in determining a set of drbs to serve the load and direct the ue to the best drb in loadbalancing steering mode
reference: the ueassistance indication allows the ue to distribute ul traffic based on its internal state and inform the upf of its decision typically for data flows without strong steering requirements

user_input: What is the purpose of the Network notification objective introduced by MUSIM for LTE/NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the network notification objective is used to specify when to transmit the utran nas or nr rlc release complete or partial data
reference: the purpose of the network notification objective introduced by musim for ltenr is to notify the network of a switch from network a for musim purpose

user_input: What does the Closed loop SLS Assurance solution in TS 28.535 and TS 28.536 provide? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the closed loop sls assurance solution provides the means for a ue to receive sls assurance related information from ues to which sls assurance has been applied without requiring any direct uetonetwork access
reference: the enhancements to the closed loop sls assurance solution include more advanced monitoring solutions that help an operator to continuously deliver the expected level of communication service quality

user_input: How does a supporting UE attach to the same core network operator from which it detached in a shared network? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the supporting ue attaches to the same core network operator from which it detached in a shared network without requiring any other ue or management function intervention
reference: a supporting ue in a shared network attaches to the same core network operator it detached from by using information stored in the ue when it was detached

user_input: When can the setting of the Privacy exception list be changed? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the setting of the privacy exception list can be changed upon request by the operator and when the operator is actively contacting the ue
reference: the setting of the privacy exception list can be changed anytime

user_input: What should the UE consider if it cannot detect any cell meeting the S criterion on a frequency for sidelink operation? [3GPP Release 17]
response: if the ue cannot detect any cell meeting the s criterion on a frequency for sidelink operation it should switch to sidelink capable ue category 0 on the same carrier
reference: if the ue cannot detect any cell on a frequency meeting the s criterion it shall consider itself to be outofcoverage for sidelink operation on that frequency

user_input: When can target UEs be positioned for lawful interception services? [3GPP Release 17]
response: target ues can be positioned for lawful interception services in both intra and internetworks provided the ue has access to the serving plmn or network
reference: target ues can be positioned for lawful interception services under all circumstances required by local regulatory requirements

user_input: What are DCI formats with CRC scrambled by MCCH-RNTI or G-RNTI referred to as? [3GPP Release 17]
response: dci formats with crc scrambled by mcchrnti or grnti are referred to as pdci formats with scrambled crnti or scrnti
reference: dci formats with crc scrambled by mcchrnti or grnti for broadcast scheduling pdsch receptions are referred to as broadcast dci formats

user_input: What kind of access can enterprise UEs have to non-public networks? [3GPP Release 17]
response: enterprise ues can have access to nonpublic 5g networks through 5g uecs which can be either public or private
reference: some enterprise ues can be restricted to only access the nonpublic network of the enterprise while others can access both a nonpublic network and a plmn where specifically allowed

user_input: What action is necessary to get access to services in Idle mode? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the user can enter the user id and pin in idle mode to access services
reference: camping on a cell is necessary to get access to services in idle mode

user_input: What is the purpose of the User Configuration mechanism in the IMS Multimedia Telephony service? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the user configuration mechanism is to configure the access parameters for the ims multimedia telephony service
reference: the user configuration mechanism allows an authorized user to indicate which identities are active or inactive on a specific ue

user_input: What is the maximum number of PDU Sessions? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
4
explanation the maximum number of pdu sessions is 4
reference: the maximum number of pdu sessions is 256

user_input: Which identity is used for indication of pre-emption in the downlink? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the rrc message pdcch format 011 indicates preemption indication by carrying a rarpreemptioninformation set
reference: intrnti is used for indication of preemption in the downlink

user_input: What does a UE determine when selecting a power for an S-SS/PSBCH block transmission occasion? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a ue determines the required snr by performing pwsopm test measurements then selects a power by comparing the snr to a given threshold
reference: a ue determines a power for an ssspsbch block transmission occasion based on the value of dlp0psbchr16 if provided else dlalphapsbch

user_input: What is the purpose of the MasterInformationBlockSidelink message? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
the masterinformationblocksidelink message is used to send the ue context information to the network which is required for ue context management and activation
explanation the masterinformationblocksidelink message is sent to the ue by the gnb to initialize the ue in sidelink mode
reference: the purpose of the masterinformationblocksidelink message is to include the system information transmitted by a ue via slbch

user_input: What is the purpose of interworking between a 5G core network and an EPC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the document states that interworking between the 5g core and the epc allows them to exchange information and coordinate actions
reference: the 5g system shall support mobility procedures between a 5g core network and an epc with minimum impact to the user experience

user_input: How does a non-supporting UE select a core network operator to serve it in a shared network? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
a nonsupporting ue can select a core network operator to serve it by sending an interoperator request to a neutral operator
explanation a nonsupporting ue selects a core network operator to serve it in a shared network by sending an interoperator request to a neutral operator
reference: a nonsupporting ue in a shared network has the operator selected by the shared network

user_input: For PSFCH transmission with HARQ-ACK information, how are the PRBs allocated? [3GPP Release 17]
response: prb allocation in psfch transmission for harqack information is the same as in the first symbol of prb allocation for pssch transmission
reference: for psfch transmission with harqack information the prbs are allocated in an ascending order of both the prb index and the cyclic shift pair index

user_input: What determines the energy detection threshold in channel access procedures? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the energy detection threshold in channel access procedures is determined by the drx cycle or the block format
reference: the energy detection threshold in channel access procedures is determined by the maximum enbgnb output power single channel bandwidth and the absence of any other technology sharing the channel

user_input: What does VarConnEstFailReportList include? [3GPP Release 17]
response: varconnestfailreportlist contains a list of reports for failed connection estimation attempts
reference: varconnestfailreportlist includes a list of the connection establishment failure andor connection resume failure information

user_input: Which interface is used to transfer short messages between the SGSN and SMS-GMSC/SMS-IWMSC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: smredirectpointerinterface is used to transfer short messages between the sgsn and smsgmscsmsiwmsc
reference: the gdinterface is used to transfer short messages between the sgsn and smsgmscsmsiwmsc

user_input: What does the RRC protocol offer to upper layers? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the rrc protocol offers a set of management functions for establishing and maintaining the connection and qosrelated functions for controlling the radio access network resources and for controlling the transmission of signaling andor user data between the user equipment and the base station
reference: the rrc protocol offers the service of broadcasting common control information to upper layers

user_input: What is SIPTO at the Local Network? [3GPP Release 17]
response: sipto at the local network indicates a condition where the source ue is allowed to originate sipto messages
reference: sipto at the local network refers to the use of a collocated lgw in the enb or a standalone gw to support certain functions

user_input: When is Paging with Wake Up Signal (WUS) used? [3GPP Release 17]
response: paging with wake up signal wus can be used when a ue is in a power saving state with ptt activated and on the active set
reference: paging with wake up signal wus is used in the rrcidle state when the ue detects wus and needs to monitor the following pos or receive a paging message

user_input: In unpaired spectrum operation, when are a DL BWP and an UL BWP linked together? [3GPP Release 17]
response: if the dl and ul bwp configurations are different for an unpaired spectrum operation the dl bwp and the ul bwp should be linked together as separate cells
reference: in unpaired spectrum operation a dl bwp and an ul bwp are linked together when the dl bwp index and the ul bwp index are the same

user_input: How is Extended Access Barring supported in shared networks? [3GPP Release 17]
response: extended access barring can be supported in shared networks by adding new access barring rules
reference: in shared networks the bscrncenodeb provides independent support for the barring of mss configured for extended access barring for each sharing operator

user_input: What are the peak packet data rates supported by the Evolved Packet System on the radio access bearer? [3GPP Release 17]
response: up to 1000 packet data rates are supported by the evolved packet system on the radio access bearer
reference: the radio access network of the evolved packet system is capable of supporting instantaneous peak packet data rates of 100 mbps on the radio access bearer downlink to the ue and 50 mbps on the uplink

user_input: What is a Personal IoT Network (PIN)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a personal iot network pin is an internet of things network dedicated to personal applications operated by the user and accessible to the user and subscribed devices
reference: a personal iot network pin is described as a network that consists of pin elements that communicate using pin direct connection or direct network connection and is managed locally

user_input: What does the 5G system need to provide for mobile base station relays using 5G connectivity provided by a different MNO? [3GPP Release 17]
response: support for interoperator roaming is required for mobile base station relays using 5g connectivity provided by a different mno
reference: the 5g system needs to support ran sharing between multiple plmns for ues connected to the 5g network via mobile base station relays assuming that relay and donor ran resources are shared among operators

user_input: When can a UE apply Type 1 channel access procedures for a UL transmission(s)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a ue applies type 1 channel access procedures for a ul transmissions only once when first establishing a connection to an ue that supports a ul multicarrier connection
reference: a ue can apply type 1 channel access procedures for a ul transmissions after receiving the corresponding capability

user_input: What does the timing advance command for a TAG indicate? [3GPP Release 17]
response: it indicates the delay required at the base station
reference: the timing advance command for a tag indicates the change of uplink timing relative to the current uplink timing

user_input: What is the high quality criterion for reporting a PLMN to the NAS in the E-UTRA and NB-IoT case? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the high quality criterion for reporting a plmn to the nas in the eutra and nbiot case is to report at least one plmn and to report one of its scfs in addition to the plmn
reference: the high quality criterion for reporting a plmn to the nas in the eutra and nbiot case is a measured rsrp value greater than or equal to 110 dbm

user_input: What is the RRC buffer size for a UE? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the rrc buffer size for a ue can range between 32kb and 512kb
reference: the rrc buffer size for a ue is 45 kbytes

user_input: What is one of the requirements for interworking between fixed access and Evolved Packet Core? [3GPP Release 17]
response: interworking between fixed access and evolved packet core should be performed without significant service disruption
reference: the evolved packet system shall be able to route different simultaneously active pdn connections through different accesses while interworking between the fixed access and evolved packet core

user_input: How is the modulation order (Qm) and target code rate (R) determined for PSSCH transmission? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the modulation order qm and target code rate r are determined for pssch transmission based on the drb0 configuration
reference: the ue uses the mcs table and the modulation and coding scheme mcs field in sci format 1a to determine the modulation order qm and target code rate r for pssch transmission

user_input: Which parameter in SL-TxProfileList-r17 indicates compatibility with DRX? [3GPP Release 17]
response:
drxsupportedintervallistr17 in sltxprofilelistr17 indicates compatibility with drx
explanation drxsupportedintervallistr17 in sltxprofilelistr17 indicates whether drx is supported and if so for what values of the drxonduration parameter
reference: the parameter drxcompatible in sltxprofilelistr17 indicates compatibility with drx

user_input: In the context of pathloss models, what is O2I? [3GPP Release 17]
response: o2i is the path loss between a ue and a bs in a reference scenario
reference: o2i stands for outdoor to indoor in the context of pathloss models

user_input: What is true about services not mentioned within the interaction clause? [3GPP Release 17]
response: services not mentioned within the interaction clause may provide additional services
reference: in general if a service is not mentioned within the interaction clause then there is no impact

user_input: What does the 5G system need to support for a UE accessing multiple network slices? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the 5g system needs to support multiple network slice accesses for a ue accessing multiple network slices
reference: for a ue authorized to access multiple network slices the 5g system needs to support accessing the most suitable network slice in minimum time minimize power consumption and minimize service interruption time

user_input: What does the 5G system prevent in terms of privacy for UEs using 5G LAN-type service? [3GPP Release 17]
